speaker: A
text: I don't see the normal humans in person. I don't ever hear from them. I just hear from Twitter, avatars, and people online. All right, so bitcoin Renaissance is here. Bitvm seems cool. I'm interested in any follow up from this episode. Somebody point out the fatal flaw of Bitvm. That would be much appreciated. Until then, I think we're good on our bitcoin series for now.
